definition: Tahiti, island of the Society Islands group in French Polynesia (Tw)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: She is busy touring Tahiti right now.
sentences.chinese: 她正在大溪地忙著度假。

sentences.english: Tahitian tattoos served as rites of passage, telling the history of the wearer's life.
sentences.chinese: 大溪地刺青擔任通過儀式，告訴歷史，穿衣者的生命。

sentences.english: This is why Tahiti is the ideal place to get away from it all.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼大溪地是個能讓人遠離塵囂的理想國度。

sentences.english: We dropped down into the water from the Tahiti Aggressor dive skiff .
sentences.chinese: 我們從大溪地“攻擊號”的潛水小筏跳進水裏。

definition: Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Bora Bora, island of the Society Islands group in French Polynesia

pinyin: Fa3 shu3 Bo1 li4 ni2 xi1 ya4

definition: Réunion (island in Indian Ocean, a French overseas department) (Tw)
Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)
